Package stocker.controller.chart

Class ChartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.controller.general.ControllerBase
      • stocker.controller.general.ControllerBaseInternal
        • stocker.controller.chart.ChartController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertiesFrameListener
    public class ChartController
extends ControllerBaseInternal
    The Chart Controller class is responsible for receiving, generating and processing chart view events and, if necessary, manipulating data in the model. It also organizes the indicator and alarm dialogs.
    Author:
    Christoph Kaplan

      • onGetFrameSCREENSTATE
